title: About Me
description: I have been interested in programming for over three years. I started with Web Development. I am passionate about new technologies and solutions. My favorite programming language is JavaScript and I focus on it, but I don't close my horizons to other technologies. There are so many of them that it is a shame not to know anything about them. I am a creative person who never gives up and tries to achieve as much as possible.
I currently work as a Front-End Developer. After hours I develop my own projects and learn new technologies. I am also a big fan of Blockchain technology.
Outside of IT, I love traveling, good wine, drinks and series. I like to play table tennis and billiards. I am also interested in the field of fitness.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: I have more than three years of learning self-study programming and working in many teams while creating various projects.

boxes.title: Software Freelancer

boxes.title: Front-end Developer
boxes.description: My first full-time job at the corporation. Creating web applications on my own and as a member of team. Cooperation with graphic designers, copywriters, using various web technologies, C#, JavaScript.

boxes.title: WEB Developer
boxes.description: Creating websites (business cards, advertising), and websites based on CMS WordPress. Cooperation with the team and graphic designers, using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, WordPress technologies.
